name: St. Lucy Filippini

locations.description: Founder of the Religious Teachers Filippini

summary: Lucy Filippini was an Italian religious educator and founder of the Religious Teachers Filippini, a congregation dedicated to the education of girls and young women. Under the guidance of Cardinal Marcantonio Barbarigo, she established schools throughout Italy, focusing on Christian formation and practical skills. Her educational methods were innovative for her time, emphasizing both spiritual and practical education for women.
